name: Idle Ultimate
description:
Idle Ultimate is the most complex, varied and interesting idle game. Your possibilities are endless. Passive income, active income, prestige system, multipliers, bets, investments, converters, rewards, ranking system - choose your own activity and use it to maximize your profit!

Gameplay features:

  • GOALS AND MEANS

    Use 5 different currencies and various income systems to complete all goals

  • GENERATORS

    Unlock 50 generators with various upgrades and powerful evolution system

  • MULTIPLIERS

    400 different multipliers to unlock. Each one matters and boosts your profit

  • PRESTIGE

    Complex prestige system with dozens upgrades which affect everything in the game

  • INVESTMENTS

    Deposit your funds to get stable passive income

  • BETS

    Are you willing to risk your funds to hit the jackpot?

  • CONVERTERS

    Do not want to farm the required currency? Welcome to the exchange page!

  • ACHIEVEMENTS

    100 various Steam achievements are waiting for you to be collected

  • STATISTICS

    70 various stats are tracked for your convenience and benefit

  • REWARDS

    Get various and useful bonuses even if you are away

  • RANKING

    It's not just an idle game. This is a global competition for those who want to take part in it

  • COMPLETION

    Unlike many other idle games, this one can be finished. But don't think it will be easy!

  • SETUP EVERYTHING

    Light and dark theme, various currencies and numbers display, switchable music with 20 tracks and many more options

Idle Ultimate is an idle game you have never played before. Endless features and possibilities. Try it now and have the fun you deserve!
